forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of patchy fog early. Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 16C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
